title: Ep - 163 - CAROLINE STANBURY FROM LADIES OF LONDON
description:
Caroline Stanbury appeared on Bravo’s Ladies of London, which chronicled the lives of six women who resided in London as they balanced their social lives, businesses, and families. Today she lives in Dubai, and has a burgeoning lifestyle business. She discusses her decision to open her life to cameras, how life changed being on the show, and gives an update on her life in the Middle East. 


Kate and her friend Tim Ryan used to wait tables at a restaurant on the Potomac River, so naturally she asked him to review the Real Housewives of Potomac. 


Lara Marie Schoenhals from SUP and Babe podcasts gives a review of this week’s episode of Real Housewives of New York.


Reality Life with Kate Casey
